Name: Switch
Description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of a switch. An input will also render when used within a form to ensure events propagate correctly.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: defaultChecked
PropData.Description: The state of the switch when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its state.

PropData.Name: checked
PropData.Description: The controlled state of the switch. Must be used in conjunction with onCheckedChange.

PropData.Name: onCheckedChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the state of the switch changes.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the state of the switch changes.

PropData.Name: required
PropData.Description: When true, indicates that the user must check the switch before the owning form can be submitted.

PropData.Name: name
PropData.Description: The name of the switch. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: The value given as data when submitted with a name.

SubComponentData.Name: Thumb
SubComponentData.Description: The thumb that is used to visually indicate whether the switch is on or off.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.
